columns.text: White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori. IN A TRADITIONAL SETTLEMENT OF THE ISLAND, MEGALOCHORI, 4 BRAND NEW SUITES OFFER LUXURY AND COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION IN NATURE. They have been created with utmost respect to the environment, following the traditional Theran architecture with modern touches of supreme aesthetics. Bright colors are prevalent in decor, reflecting natural light bathing their interior. Two of them come with exterior Jacuzzi, while the rest have access to a private swimming pool. The luxurious amenities and the cordial services create the idyllic atmosphere and ensure the optimal holiday experience for you. White Harmony Suites is the ultimate destination of relaxation in santorini. Let us introduce you to unpretentious luxury’ splendidly combined with the island’s natural beauty and its unique character.

items.seo_description: The Private Pool Suites features a comfy double bed, beautiful bathroom. Spacious pool with a view. Idyllic setting. Book this suite today!

items.description: Brand new Jacuzzi Suites are located on the first floor and may accommodate up to 5 individuals. They come with two double beds, as well as an in-built sofa bed.

items.title: Abelonas Retreat|Sunset & Sunrise Lodgings
items.description: Located in the marvelous village of Imerovigli, just a mere 2 km from the bustling capital of Fira, Abelonas Retreat combines the perfect accommodation for endless relaxing moments, along with easy accessibility to the vibrant and busy lifestyle of the Therans…day and night. Imerovigli has been named “The Balcony of the Aegean” and for a very good reason. This is in fact the pinnacle of the island, perched on a cliff top that overlooks the infinite blue sea and the Theran archipelago. An oasis of calm is waiting to welcome you for a unique experience on the island of Santorini, unveiling its most magical scenery. Abelonas Retreat is composed of 13 studios, suites and maisonettes, each in line with the Cycladic architecture and the most refined stylistic approach that captures the island’s identity. Whether you are a morning person or you love watching the sun melt into the deep blue sea, you are more than welcome to choose the lodging that will make your dreams come true. Some of the lodgings showcase an outstanding sunrise view, while others open up to the earth-shuttering sunset…both a source of inspiration and not only to the romantic at heart! Throughout the day, enjoy the shimmering sun in between your dives in the modern outdoor swimming pool. Lay back on the sun loungers, order a fruity cocktail or a healthy snack and just appreciate the moment. And when it is time for the sunset, a unique masterpiece of nature unfolds before your eyes. The sun dips in the sea and thousands of chromatic hues spread on the sky, sparkling and bright…A fusion like no other, where the natural elements join forces and create a moment in time to remember…till the next one, here at Abelonas Retreat | Sunset & Sunrise lodgings in Santorini!

items.title: Art Hotel Santorini
items.description: Art Hotel in Pyrgos village in Santorini adopted Vincent Van Gogh words in order to paint the dream hotel: “I dream my painting and then I paint my dream”. For adults and gay oriented, Art hotel is design for those who love elegance, luxury, style and they are passionate for discovering the art. Art Hotel has elegant minimalistic all-white suites highlighting the artworks within each room. At the hotel you will also find a reception that is available 24 hours a day. As for the children? You are most encouraged to leave them back home for a few days and feel the carefree breeze of Santorini with nothing getting in the way! The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel Santorini, has elegant all-white suites, each one highlighting artworks. Bespoke services of the finest quality are available.

SEO.title: White Harmony Suites Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's White Harmony Suites, located in the village of Megalochori. Less than 1 km from Thermes Beach provides luxury accomodation with free Wi-Fi.
